00030 /* Creation flags. */
00031 #define T_FPU     XNFPU
00032 #define T_SUSP    XNSUSP
00033 /* <!> High bits must not conflict with XNFPU|XNSHADOW|XNSHIELD|XNSUSP. */
00034 #define T_CPU(cpu) (1 << (24 + (cpu & 7))) /* Up to 8 cpus [0-7] */
00035 #define T_CPUMASK  0xff000000
00036 
00037 /* Status/mode flags. */
00038 #define T_BLOCKED XNPEND
00039 #define T_DELAYED XNDELAY
00040 #define T_READY   XNREADY
00041 #define T_DORMANT XNDORMANT

00043 #define T_BOOST   XNBOOST

00158 static inline RT_TASK *thread2rtask (xnthread_t *t)
00159 {
00160     return t ? ((RT_TASK *)(((char *)(t)) - (int)(&((RT_TASK *)0)->thread_base))) : NULL;
00161 }

00286 static inline int rt_task_spawn(RT_TASK *task,
00287                                 const char *name,
00288                                 int stksize,
00289                                 int prio,
00290                                 int mode,
00291                                 void (*entry)(void *cookie),
00292                                 void *cookie)
00293 {
00294     int err = rt_task_create(task,name,stksize,prio,mode);
00295 
00296     if (!err)
00297         err = rt_task_start(task,entry,cookie);
00298 
00299     return err;
00300 }
